message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find valuable. Given its unique features, I'm proposing an initial price of $2,000,000. I'm confident it can significantly benefit your operations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the price, but I'm confident in the significant value this product holds.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,700,000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,200,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
